Key Match Events: Edwin Diaz allowed a go-ahead grand slam in the 8th inning, resulting in a 8-5 loss for the Mets
Pre-Game Insights: Luis Severino was pitching in Arizona for the first time
Post-Match Reflections: The Mets are now 4.0 games behind the Braves after their loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The game was the 100th meeting between the Mets and Diamondbacks
Others: David Peterson and Ryne Nelson are scheduled to start for the Mets and Diamondbacks, respectively, in the next game
